question: Directive principles particularly article 39 (b) and (c ) of the constitution of India are many times referred as charters of the following?
option3: Liberty to move anywhere in India territories
explanation: Article 39 (b) that the ownership and control of the material resources of the community are so distributed as best to subserve the common good; and (c) that the operation of the economic system does not result in the concentration of wealth and means of production to the common detriment; these are sometimes called charter of social and economic justice.
